history.narrative: Law 13-118, the “Compensating-Use Tax Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-363, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 4, 2000, and February 1, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 18, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-271 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-118 became effective on May 23, 2000.
